Guide Questions: What operations do you perform? How do you define operations? What are your operation standards? How do you measure operation performance?
What are your operation item requirements? How do you specify operation items? What are your operation standards? How do you track operation progress?
How do you manage template items? What are your template item requirements? How do you maintain templates? How do you handle template updates?
How do you manage transport operations? What are your transport requirements? How do you track transport progress? How do you handle transport exceptions?
How do your staff access job information? What are your mobile requirements? How do you manage job cards? How do you handle mobile connectivity?
Do you use license plate scanning? What are your scanning requirements? How do you manage plate data? How do you handle scanning errors?
How do you perform stock counts? What are your counting interface requirements? How do you manage count sheets? How do you handle counting errors?
How do you track scanning activities? What are your logging requirements? How do you maintain scan logs? How do you handle log analysis?
